name: Seek and Destroy (itch) (Joshhyyy)
description:
Seek And Destroy.

This arcade-based shooter lets you pilot your ship to take down the galactic army before they destroy you! The game is simple to dodge ships and shoot ships! 

Have fun enjoying endless gameplay to reach new high scores! 

The controls are simple! 
Arrow keys left and right will move your ship. 
The Up arrow will allow your ship to shoot. 

The game is still in development so make sure you check the devlogs to keep up to date on each patch! If you want to see what I'm working on right now then check out the smaller updates on my Twitter:https://twitter.com/TheJoshhyyy

If you enjoy the game or play it at all then make sure you comment and give the game feedback all feedback is welcome and encouraged!
